title: Polling places; require the SOS mail postcards to registered voters listing.
subject: Elections

extras.summary: AN ACT TO REQUIRE THAT THE MISSISSIPPI SECRETARY OF STATE SHALL MAIL OUT POSTCARDS TO ALL REGISTERED VOTERS WITH THEIR DESIGNATED POLLING PLACE INFORMATION; TO PROVIDE THAT ANY CHANGES MADE BY LOCAL GOVERNING AUTHORITIES TO THE LOCATION OF POLLING PLACES SHALL BE PROVIDED TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE, AND THE SECRETARY OF STATE SHALL SEND OUT POSTCARDS WITH THE UPDATED INFORMATION; TO REQUIRE THAT POLLING PLACE POSTCARDS BE MAILED OUT THIRTY DAYS BEFORE A GENERAL, PRIMARY OR SPECIAL ELECTION, OR AS SOON AS POSSIBLE VIA CERTIFIED MAIL IF THE POLLING PLACE CHANGE TAKES PLACE LESS THAN THIRTY DAYS BEFORE AN ELECTION; TO AMEND SECTIONS 23-15-281 and 23-15-557, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO CONFORM; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
